swift_bucket_linked: A user linked an NII Swift bucket to a project
swift_bucket_unlinked: A user unselected an NII Swift bucket in a project
swift_file_added: A user added a file to an NII Swift bucket in a project
swift_file_removed: A user removed a file in an NII Swift bucket in a project
swift_file_updated: A user updated a file in an NII Swift bucket in a project
swift_folder_created: A user created a folder in an NII Swift in a project
swift_node_authorized: A user authorized the NII Swift addon for a project
swift_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the NII Swift addon for a project
swift_node_deauthorized_no_user: NII Swift addon for a project deauthorized
